snippet: A string of assaults — on a church, a beauty salon and a town hall — testify to the continuing threat of Boko Haram, a radical Muslim group.
abstract: At least 15 Nigerians are killed during an attack by radical Muslim sect Boko Haram on a church worship service; Christians have vowed to defend themselves from the group's widening sectarian fight against the country's government.
lead_paragraph: A string of assaults — on a church, a beauty salon and a town hall — testify to the continuing threat of Boko Haram, a radical Muslim group.

headline.seo: Boko Haram Attacks in Nigeria Kill at Least 15
